name: Dice City
description:
Post Your Highest Score!
Controls:

Pan with WASD,

Click to buy/place Buildings,

Scroll Wheel to zoom. Careful though, you might find a parallel universe if you go too far.

Spacebar activates our advanced roll-of-the-dice decision making system to choose whether to restart the current experience or crash entirely. This was the defining design choice that led us to this masterpiece.

Legend:

Grey: Used to place more buildings and can only be placed on oil wells

Green: Mines oil on four tiles a distance of 6 tiles away

Blue: Earns money based on other dice in the vicinity

Red: Clears mountains

Yellow: Makes all dice cheaper by one

Purple: Scores points based on other dice in the vicinity

Credits:
SmeagolDaRegal - Programming

CheeryCherry - Art Design

Duh8055Man - Music/SFX

A city builder made for the 2022 GMTK experience jam.
